headline: Pentair plc (PNR) Beats Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Pentair (PNR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.14% and +1.60%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Pentair Announces New Executive Leadership Roles to Accelerate Growth and Enhance Customer Focus
summary: LONDON, February 03, 2026--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, today announced new strategic appointments within its executive leadership team (ELT) aimed at accelerating growth, strengthening innovation, and enhancing responsiveness to evolving customer needs.

headline: Pentair Reports Strong Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: LONDON, February 03, 2026--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR) today announced fourth quarter 2025 sales of $1,021 million. Sales were up 5 percent compared to sales for the same period last year. Excluding currency translation, acquisitions and divestitures, core sales grew 4 percent in the fourth quarter. Fourth quarter 2025 earnings per diluted share from continuing operations ("EPS") were $0.98 compared to $0.99 in the fourth quarter of 2024.
